en_text: Wow, so pretty!

en_text: It really is beautiful!
jp_text: 本当にきれい

en_text: This is making me tired...
jp_text: （フィーロ）うへえ…

en_text: It's because you're converting \Nyour mana into thread.
jp_text:
フィーロちゃんの魔力を
糸に換えてるからね
google_translated:
Philo's magic
I'm replacing it with a thread

en_text: Endure it for just a while longer.
jp_text: もうちょっとだけ我慢して
google_translated: I will endure a little more

en_text: I'll give you a snack once you finish.
jp_text:
（ラフタリア）終わったら
おやつをあげますから
google_translated:
when finished
I will give you a snack

en_text: How do I look, Master?
jp_text: ご主人様　どう？

en_text: Yay! Thank you, Master!
jp_text:
（フィーロ）わーい
ご主人様　ありがとう

en_text: I mean, sure, she looks cute...
jp_text: そりゃまあ かわいいですけど

en_text: Doesn't she?!
jp_text: いいんじゃないか？

en_text: I used white as the base color,\N to go with her wings.
jp_text:
羽に合わせて
色は白をベースに
google_translated:
Together with the feathers
The color is based on white

en_text: I added in plenty of frills as \Na nod to her feathers, too.
jp_text:
フリルをふんだんにあしらったのも
羽のイメージです
google_translated:
It was also full of frills
It is an image of feathers

en_text: And since it'd contrast \Nbest with her blonde hair,
jp_text:
金髪とのコントラストが
一番映える差し色として
google_translated:
Contrast with blonde
It is the best colored color

en_text: I went with blue for the ribbon!
jp_text: リボンは青にしました

en_text: R-Right...
jp_text: は… はあ…

en_text: The monster crest and magic outfit \Nadd up to 340 silvers in total.
jp_text:
魔物紋に
魔法の服の仕立代も合わせて
google_translated:
Demon crest
Match the creation fee of magic clothes

en_text: Don't suddenly transform indoors!
jp_text:
（ラフタリア）ああっ
部屋の中で急に変身しない
google_translated:
Oh
Do not transform suddenly in the room

en_text: The ribbon looks oh-so-cute \Neven in her monster form!
jp_text:
はあー！
魔物姿でもリボンがキュート
google_translated:
Hmm!
Even in the demon figure, the ribbon is cute

en_text: Don't you agree?
jp_text: そう思いませんか？
